query: "When was the last time I was assessed for alcohol use disorders?"
resource_summaries:
This record is about a completed procedure for assessing alcohol use disorders using the Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test - Consumption. The assessment was performed on August 10, 2016, and the location was at PCP167180.

answer: The last time you were assessed for alcohol use disorders was on August 10, 2016, at location PCP167180 using the Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test - Consumption.
